title: 45 Minute Cycle Training Workout - Sprint Training
description:
Subscribe to GCN Training: https://gcn.eu/GCNTraining

Get fit with GCN! This indoor cycle training video is a 45 minute sprint training session, designed to help you improve your cycle fitness.

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN store! http://gcn.eu/BuyGCNKit_
Sign up to the GCN newsletter: http://gcn.eu/gcnnewsletter

Increase your sprinting ability with this short indoor training session for turbo trainer or static bike which can equally be used on rollers too. Designed to be a improve your seated and standing sprint, this session is a great workout for the legs, core and of course to improve cardiovascular fitness. If you're not sweating buckets at the end, you're not doing it right... Turn 'n' Burn!!!

Thanks to:
Paul Ryman: http://www.paulrymanfitness.co.uk
Nuffield Health: http://www.nuffieldhealth.com/gyms/Bristol

If you want to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link to help out 👍 : http://gcn.eu/6z

Music - licensed by Cue Songs
Temper Trap - Science Of Fear: http://gcn.eu/147u67m

Ugly Duckling - Eintestin: http://gcn.eu/1dBW5T0

Ugly Duckling - Sprint: http://gcn.eu/1hhAkqC
Tochner - We Go Ego (Original Mix): http://gcn.eu/1jbgHnk
Adam Salkeld, Neil Pollard - The Will To Win: http://gcn.eu/19zK67k
Borderline - Informed: http://gcn.eu/1601lsp
iLL Audio - One Man War: http://gcn.eu/1eQQW8p
An Echo - From Dust: http://gcn.eu/1cB0102
Winston Ready - Dim The Light: http://gcn.eu/1mgSU5c

Not all exercises are suitable for everyone - there is no ‘one size fits all’ approach. As with any strenuous exercise, you should take into account factors such as your flexibility, strength and overall health to determine if an exercise is appropriate for you, and consult a doctor/physician before beginning a programme of exercise. Discontinue your exercise session immediately if you experience any pain, dizziness or discomfort. 
Partaking in training sessions following GCN's video instruction is entirely at your own risk, and Global Cycling Network, its partners and its affiliated companies cannot be held responsible for any injuries which may occur as a result of these exercises.

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic summit of the Stelvio to the epic trails of Fort William, Scotland, everywhere there is pavé or dirt, world-class racing, and pro riders, we will be there bringing you all the action, essential analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year.

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling

Youtube Channel - http://gcn.eu/gcnYT
Facebook - http://gcn.eu/gcnFb
Google+ - http://gcn.eu/gcnGPlus
Twitter - http://gcn.eu/gcnTW

Leave us a comment below!

Music - licensed by Cue Songs
channelDescription:
The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network!

comments: I am STILL doing this year after year - it's still the best synergy of inspiration, music and choreography. I've done 100's of spin classes in person over the years and enjoyed being pushed by some seriously inspiring leaders - but nothing online has been as good as this one class. It even got me fit again after battling stage 4 cancer and massive back surgery. A totally inspiring session with a fun group and a motivating leader. His evocation of actual road riding is especially appreciated - I can picture some of my favourite strava segments as I'm doing some of these intervals. And if I'm perfectly honest - I've occasionally heard Paul's exhortations while I'm out road riding! Thanks so much for this - it's an incredibly valuable and appreciated session!
Hey GCN, you guys need more videos with Paul he’s an excellent teacher
One of the best spinning instructors I ever have the opportunity to see on the internet. I think Paul Ryman is a very knowledgeable instructor. Thanks, GCN for this video.
Paul is the best gcn instructor. More of Paul please!!
One of my fave GCN rides, keep going back to it and now found nearly all the tracks on Spotify
